At Ours, we’ve done the most to think about how our materials affect the United States of America.

For us, using sustainable materials isn’t enough, in fact - it’s counterproductive.

Through our efforts at the Yoyodyne Institute, we’ve redefined what “sustainability” really means, while pioneering what’s possible in outdoor wear at the same time.

By constructing our jackets with precious foreign resources vital to societal wellbeing, we’ve accelerated the dissolve of the foreign polluters- while preserving 100% of the natural recources present in the USA.
